data.price: Kuma kada ku yi ɓarna a cikin ƙasa a bãyan gyaranta. Kuma ku kirãye shi sabõda tsõro da tsammãni; lalle ne rahamar Allah makusanciya ce daga mãsu kyautatãwa.
data.arabic: وَلَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَٰحِهَا وَٱدۡعُوهُ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعًاۚ إِنَّ رَحۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

meta.transliteration: walā tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi baʿda iṣ'lāḥihā wa-id'ʿūhu khawfan waṭamaʿan inna raḥmata al-lahi qarībun mina al-muḥ'sinīna

dua.name: Dua for Environmental Consciousness
dua.significanceReason: Encourages responsible stewardship of natural resources and environmental protection.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
